title: Collaborative Learning Design Using Graphic Organizers in Online Discussions

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design and online discussion facilitation experience
context.additional_context: A digitally equipped classroom environment for learners in managerial/leadership roles in science, enabling the use of digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can present diverse perspectives on scientific issues in online discussions using graphic organizers.
Learners can systematically analyze peers' ideas through graphic organizers generated in collaborative learning environments.
Learners can effectively utilize graphic organizers to enhance cognitive engagement levels during discussions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
